page.title: 18WIX POST OFFICE ,JOHN WALLS
page.content: MR BROWN IS THE WIX POSTMASTER.THE WIX POST OFFICE IS A SUB POST OFFICE.MR BROWN ALSO SELLS; NEWSPAPERS,SWEETS,CIGARETES,STATIONERY ,TOYS AND BOOKS.HE EMPLOYS 3 PART TIME HELPERS AND ELEVEN PAPER BOYS AND GIRLS.THE POST OFFICE OPENS AT 9AM AND CLOSES AT 5:30PM.THE BUSIEST DAY IS THURSDAY WHICH IS PENSION DAY. THE CUSTOMERS DON'T ALWAYS COME FROM WIX BUT FROM WRABNESS,GREAT OAKLEY AND STONES GREEN AS WELL.THE POST OFFICE IS A MEETING PLACE FOR THE OLDER PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE.MAIL AND PARCELS ARE COLLECTED TWICE A DAY FROM THE POST OFFICE.MR BROWN HAS TO GET UP AT 6:15AM TO SORT OUT THE NEWSPAPERS.FROM THE POST OFFICE YOU CAN BUY STAMPS FOR LETTERS,TELEPHONE AND TELEVISION STAMPS. YOU CAN ALSO BUY A LICENCE FOR A DOG OR A TELEVISION. YOU CAN ALSO USE THE POST OFFICE AS A BANK.{
